Recent drives have recovered some land, but the court seeks comprehensive accountability.

Vance, who was in Washington D.C. at the time, expressed gratitude for the quick response and requested media discretion regarding images of the damage.

description: LeBron James has achieved another historic milestone, moving into second place all-time in total assists (regular season and playoffs) by surpassing Chris Paul. This accomplishment, combined with his status as the NBA's all-time leading scorer, makes him the first player to hold the top spot in scoring and second in assists.

He further criticised the ongoing case in Supreme Court citing "national security" and calling it the "one of the most important decision ever".

description: Colombian President Gustavo Petro declared he would "take up arms" after US President Donald Trump threatened military action and accused him of drug trafficking. Petro defended Colombia's anti-narcotics strategy, warning that excessive force could lead to civilian casualties and a surge in guerrilla activity. The exchange follows a US operation in Venezuela that captured President Maduro.

His explosive start set the tone after South Africa posted 245, anchored by Jason Rowles' 114. This performance highlights Sooryavanshi's formidable form ahead of the U-19 World Cup.

title: Cold wave tightens grip on Himachal Pradesh, fresh snowfall reported in higher areas
description: Himachal Pradesh witnessed a fresh snowfall in higher reaches, while severe cold wave conditions with dense fog and ground frost were reported across the region. Minimum temperatures, reportedly, plummeted, with Tabo recording the coldest at minus 10.2 degrees Celsius. A travel advisory has also been issued for Lahaul-Spiti due to sustained winter severity.

Quote of the day by William Shakespeare: 'Love all, trust a few…'
description: William Shakespeare, the 'Bard of Avon,' born in 1564, remains an unparalleled literary giant. He stands no match in any writer till date. No one has been able to replace William Shakespeare. His prolific career yielded 39 plays, 154 sonnets, and narrative poems, profoundly shaping the English language with over 1,700 invented words. His works, from comedies like 'A Midsummer Night's Dream' to tragedies like 'Hamlet,' continue to resonate globally, influencing psychology and literature.

Aluminium foil use for food: Doctor explains when to be cautious
description: Studies reveal that aluminum foil can leach unsafe levels of metals into food, particularly with acidic, salty, or spicy items cooked at high temperatures. This excess aluminum intake over time may contribute to bone problems, kidney strain, and nerve-related issues. Experts advise using steel, glass, or ceramic containers for storage and avoiding direct contact between foil and certain foods.

title: Grant Hackett & Sharlene Fletcher net worth: Swimming legacy and lifestyle
description: Grant Hackett, a decorated Australian swimmer, has successfully transitioned his athletic earnings and sponsorships into a substantial net worth of $7-$12 million AUD. Alongside his wife Sharlene Fletcher, who manages their family life, the couple maintains a stable financial standing through Hackett's post-swimming business ventures and investments, reflecting a grounded approach to wealth.

title: Andrew McCutchen & Maria Hanslovan net worth: MLB earnings, deals and assets
description: Andrew McCutchen's stellar MLB career, marked by five All-Star selections and an MVP award, has been the bedrock of his substantial finances, amassing over $131 million from contracts. His wife, Maria Hanslovan, contributes significantly through her thriving fitness and wellness career. Together, their combined net worth is estimated between $60-$65 million, bolstered by endorsements and joint assets.

title: Vanessa Bryant says friends pushed her forward long after Kobe’s Lakers legacy
description: Vanessa Bryant, widow of NBA legend Kobe Bryant, continues to champion the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation. Recently, she shared a striking photo, crediting her friends for encouraging her to be more present in pictures.  She also celebrated Taylor Swift wearing Kobe Bryant merchandise, a gesture her daughters, avid Swifties, would appreciate.

title: Erik Karlsson luxury watch collection: Inside his Rolex choices and style
description: Erik Karlsson, the Pittsburgh Penguins defenseman, is a man with not only the finest NHL competency but also the best watch collection. One of the most favorite models in his collection is the Rolex Submariner "Kermit", which is a superb gift to his fans and collectors. Karlsson has a sense of taste in watches, which portrays his luxury that both performs on the ice and is an elegant timepiece.

title: Taylor Swift reportedly shaken by Travis Kelce’s confession ahead of wedding
description: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have been dealing with a lot on their plate ever since they announced their engagement last year. While the two have kept themselves busy with planning their wedding, it seems Taylor Swift is deeply unsettled by some of Travis Kelce's words that he has said in public about his past. It seems this has become a huge deal for Taylor Swift ahead of their wedding.

title: Matthew Mercer steps back from Critical Role livestream amid burnout reflection
description: Matthew Mercer has stepped back from leading Critical Role’s “Dungeons and Dragons” livestream after opening up about burnout and creative exhaustion. While he remains involved in major projects like animated series and game publishing, Brennan Lee Mulligan now serves as game master for Campaign Four. Mercer says taking time away is essential for long-term creativity, balance, and renewed inspiration.

title: AI debate: Mathematician Joel Hamkins warns; ‘LLMs give wrong answers’
description: Renowned mathematician Joel David Hamkins has voiced strong doubts about large language models' utility in mathematical research, calling their outputs "garbage" and "not mathematically correct." He highlights AI's frustrating tendency to confidently assert incorrectness and resist correction, mirroring unproductive human interactions. Despite AI's benchmark successes, Hamkins finds current systems unreliable for genuine research collaboration.
